commonTestFlag.description: Common flag for testing. Do NOT modify.

useModernRuntimeScheduler.description: When enabled, it uses the modern fork of RuntimeScheduler that allows scheduling tasks with priorities from any thread.

enableMicrotasks.description: Enables the use of microtasks in Hermes (scheduling) and RuntimeScheduler (execution).

batchRenderingUpdatesInEventLoop.description: When enabled, the RuntimeScheduler processing the event loop will batch all rendering updates and dispatch them together at the end of each iteration of the loop.

jsOnlyTestFlag.description: JS-only flag for testing. Do NOT modify.
